org.spongepowered.api.service.persistence

Interface SerializationService


  • public interface SerializationService
    A service that manages DataBuilders and sometimes the deserialization of various DataSerializables.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends DataSerializable>
      Optional<DataBuilder<T>>      		 getBuilder(Class<T> clazz)
      Attempts to retrieve the DataBuilder for the desired DataSerializable class.
      <T extends DataSerializable>
      void      		 registerBuilder(Class<T> clazz, DataBuilder<T> builder)
      Registers a DataBuilder that will dynamically build the given DataSerializable from a DataContainer.

    • Method Detail

      • registerBuilder

        <T extends DataSerializable> void registerBuilder(Class<T> clazz,
                                                  DataBuilder<T> builder)
        Registers a DataBuilder that will dynamically build the given DataSerializable from a DataContainer.

        Builders may not always exist for a given DataSerializable, nor is it guaranteed that a provided builder will function with all DataContainers.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of data serializable
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class of the DataSerializable
        builder - The builder that can build the data serializable

      • getBuilder

        <T extends DataSerializable> Optional<DataBuilder<T>> getBuilder(Class<T> clazz)
        Attempts to retrieve the DataBuilder for the desired DataSerializable class.

        Builders may not always exist for a given DataSerializable, nor is it guaranteed that a provided builder will function with all DataContainers.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of data serializable
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class of the data serializable
        Returns:
        The builder, if available
